enemies

Class Enemy_Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • enemies.Enemy_Template
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Enemy_Shooter

    public abstract class Enemy_Template
extends java.lang.Object
    A Enemy_Template is made up of one or more EnemySegment. The first EnemySegment is the "head" of the Enemy_Template. The last EnemySegment is the "tail" of the Enemy_Template. As the Enemy_Template moves, it adds one cell to the head and then removes one from the tail. If the Enemy_Template eats a piece of food, the head adds one cell but the tail will not shrink.
